PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IMPORTANT NOTES
BANDITS - Alira early on if you need resistances, otherwise take +2 passives or respec to it later.
Pantheons - Brine King + Ralakesh until maps then Arakkali + Shakari
LAB ORDER - (Norm/Cruel/Merc/Uber) Plaguebringer / Corpse Pact / Commander of Darkness / Mistress of Sacrifice
Try to make sure you cap your resistances whenever possible (75, 75, 75) You can see this from the defence Panel on your character screen if you press the default key C. For everytime you kill Kitava your resistances will be reduced by 30 for a maximum of 60 reduced resistances after you kill Kitava the second time.
Get an Instant (Seething) Divine Life Flask as soon as you can. This flask is very important.
*****IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THIS*****
You can not Fit Conc effect inside the Gem links until you craft 4% Reduced Mana Reserve on your Helmet!
*****IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THIS*****
-------Leveling-------
Freezing Pulse 1 - 4 Freezing Pulse - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be muled on a Scion)
Stormblast 1 - 7 Stormblast Mine - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Swift Assembly - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
Frost blink 1 - 9 Frost Blink - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
Frost Bomb 1 - 7 Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be muled on a Scion) Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
Frost Bomb 8 - 12 Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be muled on a Scion) Added Lightning - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Orb of Storms 12+ Orb of Storms - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be muled on a Scion) Added Lightning - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Arc 12+ Arc - Act 1 - Nessa - The Sirens Cadence Added Lightning - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Herald of Ice Herald of Ice - Act 2 - Yeena - Intruders in Black
Herald of Thunder Herald of Thunder - Act 2 - Yeena - Intruders in Black
Flame Dash 12+ Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
-------Spellslinger Leveling-------
Arc Spellslinger Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Arc - Act 1 - Nessa - The Sirens Cadence Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Lightning Penetration - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Wave Spellslinger Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Wave of Conviction - Act 2 - Yeena - Intruders in Black Phyiscal to Lightning - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Ball Lightning Spellslinger Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Ball Lightning - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand Slower Projectiles - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Frenzy 24 - 38 Frenzy - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Lesser Multiple Projectiles - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Frenzy 38+ Frenzy - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Lesser Multiple Projectiles - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Curse on Hit - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Elemental Weakness - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Enduring Cry (Instant Warcry+) Enduring Cry - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Second Wind - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Increased Duration - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
-------Endgame-------
Pre Trigger Wand (Before you get a Trigger Wand) Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Bone Offering - Act 1 - Nessa - The Sirens Cadence Tempest Shield - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
Post Trigger Wand (When you get a Trigger Wand) Bone Offering - Act 1 - Nessa - The Sirens Cadence Wave of Conviction - Act 2 - Yeena - Intruders in Black Combustion - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Spellslinger VD/DD Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Hypothermia - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Spell Cascade - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Volatile Dead - Act 1 - Nessa - The Sirens Cadence Inspiration - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Detonate Dead - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
Spellslinger Desecrate Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Desecrate - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Spell Cascade - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
Spellslinger Detonate Dead Spellslinger - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Detonate Dead - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Inspiration - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Frenzy + Barrage support Inspiration - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Frenzy - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Combustion - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Vaal Molten Shell / Shield Charge Vaal Molten Shell -Need to find this in Vaal side area/Trade for this/Corrupt Molten Shells Shield Charge - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Fortify - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Flame Dash Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Tempest Shield Tempest Shield - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
Enduring Cry Enduring Cry - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Second Wind - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Increased Duration - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
